entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending before morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 2 May 2023
